speaker: Mary
text: *Mary enters, waving a letter.* Alex, guess what! I got the internship! I'll be working right out of college!

speaker: Alex
text: *Alex grins.* That's fantastic, Mary! I knew you'd get it.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary sighs.* It does make me think though... About us, and our future. It's probably a good thing we didn't rush into anything.

speaker: Alex
text: *Alex nods, looking slightly hurt.* I think you're right, Mary. I mean... it hurts a little, but I know that if God wants us to be together, everything will work itself out. After Victoria... I've learned to trust Him to work all things out for good.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary reaches out, touching his arm.* I'm sorry, Alex... and I believe you're right. He's got us.
